The Saint Sophia Cathedral Bookstore serves the community by offering a terrific selection of books, icons, stephana (wedding wreaths), gifts and other items for the Orthodox home. Titles by authors both ancient and modern are available for understanding and growth in the Faith. A variety of cultural books are offered ranging from Lenten cooking to what it means to be Greek in America today. Parents will also find an assortment for children.

Contact Bill Striglos with any questions.
